00018 #ifndef COBASE_DEFINES_H
00019 #define COBASE_DEFINES_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef __APPLE__
00022 #  include <co/base/definesDarwin.h>
00023 #endif
00024 #ifdef __linux
00025 #  include <co/base/definesLinux.h>
00026 #endif
00027 #ifdef _WIN32 //_MSC_VER
00028 #  include <co/base/definesWin32.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 // Defining our own min/max macros seems to be the only sane way to get this
00032 // functionality across platforms thanks to some screwup in the MS header files.
00033 #define EQ_MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b)) //!< returns the maximum of two values
00034 #define EQ_MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b)) //!< returns the minimum of two values
00035 
00037 #define EQ_UNDEFINED_UINT32   (0xffffffffu)
00038 
00039 #define EQ_MAX_UINT32         (0xfffffff0u)
00040 
00042 #define EQ_TIMEOUT_INDEFINITE 0
00043 
00044 #endif // COBASE_DEFINES_H
